identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a raw, intense, and physical digital experience for wrestling enthusiasts. Reject clinical SaaS aesthetics in favor of the 'Underground Dojo' vibe.
principles: Fusion: Brutalist Typography x Sports Analytics
Emotion: Sweat, Grit, and Secret Knowledge
Content: Video is King. The player is the altar.
Contrast: Deep blacks vs. Electric Warning Colors

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, pricing tiers

usage_rules.gradients: NO generic gradients. Use noise textures over solid colors.
usage_rules.primary_color: Use RED (#dc2626) for 'Secret Techniques', CTAs, and the Admin Upload button.

visual_enhancers.texture: Apply a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to the main background to simulate a wrestling mat texture.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with #27272a. Active states get #dc2626 border.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows for a brutalist feel. box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,1).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only on sticky nav and video controls: bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/10.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid for Video Categories. Mix of 1x1 (Technique), 2x1 (Featured Move), and 2x2 (Series).
layout.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24. Gap: gap-8.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Uppercase text. Hard shadow on hover.

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.content: Image top (aspect-video), Title (Anton), Meta info (Manrope) bottom.

admin_upload_trigger.style: w-14 h-14 rounded-full bg-primary text-white shadow-2xl flex items-center justify-center hover:scale-110 transition-transform cursor-pointer

hero_background.treatment: Black and white, high contrast, overlay with gradient-to-t from-background to-transparent

motion.hover_effects: Scale up 1.02, Border color change, Hard shadow offset increase

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #fafafa on dark backgrounds. Use #a1a1aa for secondary text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add Anton and Manrope to index.html or import in CSS.
3. AUTH: Implement Google OAuth. Store user email in context/state.
4. ADMIN: Create a 'ProtectedAdminComponent' that checks if user.email === 'edric.yan2022@gmail.com'. Wrap the '+' upload button in this.
5. PLANS: Create 3 tiers: Free (Basics), Monthly ($X), Annual ($Y - Best Value).
6. VIDEOS: Use a mock data array for now, but structure it with 'category', 'isPremium', 'videoUrl'.
7. CONTACT: Simple form or mailto link for edric.yan2022@gmail.com.
8. DO NOT use generic gradients. Stick to the 'Dark Dojo' aesthetic.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
